name: Cloudsight
description: CloudSight's mission is to become the global leader in image captioning and understanding. Our aim is to deliver the most superior and state-of-the-art solution to people and companies around the world. CloudSight. has two breakthrough consumer apps - CamFind, the world's first successful mobile visual search engine, which allows you to "Search the Physical World"​ and find information about anything just by taking a picture from your mobile device; and TapTapSee, an app for the blind and visually impaired that utilizes the mobile device's camera and VoiceOver to photograph objects and identify them out loud for the user.
